name: moist-region
description:
This is for the libGDX Jam, my man!

You are the ancient city. Sail the city across the endless sea and provide for your population. Find balance in the size of the population as more mouths to feed means the food goes faster.

Play for as long as possible - keep the city floating. 

Controls: A and D to turn the sails on the ancient city. 

The white dial shows the wind direction and the red dial shows your speed and direction. Try to find the best angle of attack against the wind and catch as much fish as possible. The bigger the fish, the more the food. Red fish are sharks.

And yes, you can zoom in and out with z and x, but you're not really supposed to... ;-)

Secret tip: Press Return before starting the game with Space - to enable all debug features. Then  you can press S to track a shark instead of the city, F to track a fish and C to go back to the City. Fun fun fun!
